attachments.title: Comments regarding 1234 Abundant Avenue
attachments.text:
To whom it may concern:

This is just a short note to express my support for 1234 Abundant Avenue. The project is near my work in West Point Grey. 

This project deserves to be approved for the reasons listed below:
- Central, walkable neighbourhoods like this are the best places to build more homes
- We desperately need more rental homes in Vancouver

1234 Abundant Avenue deserves to be approved, but some things could be improved:
- I would like the project to have more family-sized units
- It's disappointing that a project like this requires a rezoning

Sincerely yours,
Test McTesterson
4567 Fake Street, Vancouver. V5T 0A1

attachments.fallback: Your client does not support approving/rejecting messages
